title: Hart of Hers
description: (Alternate cover edition can be found here)I said yes.To the most hard-headed workaholic on Earth. Sometimes it's tempting to strangle the stubborn idiot. Instead, I'll just marry him. Because I'm in love with the world's sexiest stubborn idiot.And if Jerkface thinks he can threaten my man? He's got another thing coming.Warning: Strong language, mature content, drama, and angst included. Shirt sold separately.This novella is an adult contemporary romance featuring a disabled hero who (still) happens to be a rich and sexy alpha male with a potty mouth.Cale and Mickey: Book 3 of 4
author: Annie Arcane
